alert.note: Alert for Green (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Green County through 1245 PM CDT... At 1217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Greensburg. This storm was moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Green County, including the following locations... Eve, Allendale, Hudgins, Lobb, Gabe, Coakley and Summersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
